document_data.caption: Smokers.
document_data.name: Smoker
document_data.mainbody: '''Smokers''' were props in the Realms popular among [[bard]]s who used the smoke they emitted to enhance their performances.
document_data.Description: A single smoker was the size of a finger and made from [[incense]]. They belched smoke when tossed onto an open flame such as a [[brazier]].
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 3 [[gold piece]]s.
